mapper.select: select articleId, articleTitle, articleWriter, date_format(articleInsertDate,'%Y-%m-%d') articleInsertDate, articleHit, articleCategory from article where articleDeleteDate is null and articleCategory = #{articleCategory}

select articleId, articleTitle, articleContent, articleWriter, date_format(articleInsertDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') articleInsertDate, articleHit, articleCategory from article where articleDeleteDate is null and articleId = #{articleId}
mapper.update: update article set articleHit = articleHit+1 where articleId = #{articleId} and articleDeleteDate is null
mapper.insert: insert into article (articleTitle, articleContent, articleWriter, articleCategory, articleInsertDate) values(#{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{articleWriter}, #{articleCategory}, now())
mapper.update: update article set(articleTitle, articleContent, articleCategory) values(#{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{articleCategory}) where articleId = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from article_category where categoryName = #{articleCategory}
